page.title: 04The Village of Barston
page.content: Barston is a small village.It has many old houses with beams to support them. Some houses have sunk into the ground making them crooked.The windows in the houses are very small and they have criss cross patterns on them.They are called leaded windows.The village has a village pump which is no longer in use.Beside the pump is a ruined old pound where they kept stray animals. The farmers had to pay to get them out. The village has a post office and general stores.The village has a small pub named the Bulls Head.There is a house there called The School House.It may have been something to do with an old school.There is no school there now.
